pages.title: Geologic Pick
pages.text: The Geologic Pick is the dedicated instrument needed to gather usable fossil saplings. Used in a similar fashion to a vanilla pickaxe, the geologic pick has a special interaction with plant fossil blocks.
Once used on a plant fossil block it will drop a stone block and, in some cases, a fossil sapling as well. These saplings can then be rejuvenated with the use of an enchanted Bone Wand
